issues.code: className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-white/5 border border-white/10 rounded-lg text-white placeholder-white/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#2E7D32] focus:border-transparent transition-all backdrop-blur-sm"

issues.fix: Use dark text on light backgrounds for WCAG AA compliance

issues.code: text-[10px]
issues.message: Hardcoded font size 10px doesn't follow golden ratio scale
issues.fix: Use: text-base (16px), text-[26px] (H6), text-[42px] (H5), text-[68px] (H4), text-[110px] (H3), text-[178px] (H2), or clamp() for H1

issues.code: text-[10px]
issues.message: Hardcoded font size 10px doesn't follow golden ratio scale
issues.fix: Use: text-base (16px), text-[26px] (H6), text-[42px] (H5), text-[68px] (H4), text-[110px] (H3), text-[178px] (H2), or clamp() for H1
